markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blisterwort](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1991)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 280 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clear, viscous liquid causes lesions and blisters that spread quickly. The victim's pain response increases and flesh breaks easily under physical stress.

 **Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 poison damage and weakness 2 to physical and force damage; **Stage 2** 5d6 poison damage and weakness 4 to physical and force damage; **Stage 3** 7d6 poison damage and weakness 6 to physical and force damage

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blisterwort
